# read(into:)

**Instance Method**

Reads an entire audio buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
func read(into buffer: AVAudioPCMBuffer) throws
```

## Parameters

- **buffer**: The buffer from which to read the file. Its format must match the file’s processing format.

## Discussion

When reading sequentially from the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioFile/framePosition] property, the method attempts to fill the buffer to its capacity. On return, the buffer’s [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioFile/length] property indicates the number of sample frames it successfully reads.

## Related Documentation

- **framePosition**: The position in the file where the next read or write operation occurs.
- **length**: The number of sample frames in the file.

## Reading and Writing the Audio Buffer

- **read(into:frameCount:)**: Reads a portion of an audio buffer using the number of frames you specify.
- **write(from:)**: Writes an audio buffer sequentially.
- **close()**: Closes the audio file.
